title: Anthropic warns of Chinese hackers misusing Claude: Spying on firms globally

This marks a significant shift in cyberattack execution, with AI performing most of the tasks.

description: Vote counting begins today in Mahua, where Tej Pratap Yadav is making a high-stakes bid to reclaim the seat he debuted in. He's contesting as an independent against RJD's incumbent Mukesh Kumar Raushan and LJP's Sanjay Singh, aiming to disrupt the existing political landscape.

title: Danapur: BJP’s Ram Kripal Yadav pulls ahead, extends lead over RJD’s Rit Lal Roy
description: In the Danapur constituency, BJP's Ram Kripal Yadav is steadily extending his lead after 29 rounds of counting, positioning himself advantageously against the RJD's Rit Lal Roy. This seat, located in Patna district, has experienced a dynamic political atmosphere, with historical patterns of fluctuating party support.

title: '5-phase plan’: How Al-Falah doctors built nationwide plot to 'avenge' Babri demolition
description: A chilling plot to unleash coordinated blasts in six cities on December 6, the Babri Masjid demolition anniversary, has been uncovered by investigators. Arrested members of a Jaish-e-Mohammad-linked module revealed plans to "avenge" the 1992 event, with a five-phase strategy involving IED assembly and target reconnaissance. Security has been heightened across multiple regions.

title: Anta bypoll 2025 result: BJP’s Morpal Suman leads in early trends
description: The Anta Assembly by-election in Rajasthan sees a direct contest between Congress candidate Pramod Jain Bhaya and BJP's Morpal Suman, with Congress rebel Naresh Meena also in the fray. The bypoll, held after the disqualification of a BJP MLA, recorded a high voter turnout of 80.21%.

title: Bihar election results: Key fights to watch out for; big verdict today
description: Bihar's high-stakes elections conclude with results due Friday. Exit polls hint at an NDA return, with all eyes on the counting. The article highlights key constituencies like Raghopur, Madhepura, and Alinagar, featuring prominent political figures and intriguing contests.  Internal INDIA bloc 'friendly fights' between Congress and RJD/CPI(ML) could impact the outcome.

title: Tarn Taran bypoll result: AAP retains assembly seat with Harmeet Sandhu
description: Tarn Taran Assembly by-election in Punjab recorded a voter turnout of 60.95%, a slight decrease from the 2022 assembly elections. Polling was peaceful across 222 booths, with the results to be declared today. The by-election, necessitated by the death of an AAP MLA, is a key test for the ruling party's popularity.
